reviewText: after all these years I found it hard to watch this video I cant help but feel embarrassed for the players a little bit on how it was made, but really its still awesome and I will use this before ever bears game to bear down Go BEARS!!

reviewText: So sure that they were going to win the Super Bowl, the Chicago Bears filmed this masterpiece well before they were even close to the game!  How cool is that?  I was 12 years old, living in Chicago, when this first appeared.  Loved it then.  Love it now.

reviewText: Super Bowl Shuffle...one of a kind...perfection...so great my brother stole my copy.  A must for Bears fans or nostalgia freaks.  The 1980s Bears...come on, if you remember the Shuffle, you want the CD.

reviewText: OhMyLovieDitka! Da Bears are goin' back to da Bowl?Could beMight beIt is!It's official!!We're shufflin' again!!!Time to celebrate! And while we're waiting for Da Bowl and all those dogs you're gonna eat, what better time to start the New Years' resolution exercise regimen? Get up and "Move Your Body," as that health-advocating commercial says, along with "Samurai Mike," "Sweetness," "Mama's Boy Otis," da`Fridge, and da rest of Da Bears "Shufflin' Crew.""We're not here lookin for troubleWe're just here to do the SuperBowl Shuffle!"Payton says:"[they're] not herebecause we're greedywe're just hereto feed the needy."Richard Simmons, eat your heart out! /TundraVision, Amazon Revieweramended 1/21/2007
summary: Sweatin' to the Oldies - Chicago Style
